## By civic association
Each civic association- return map


```{r EachCivicAssocation, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
setwd('..')
df_ranks <- read.csv('data/civ_stats.csv')
civ_geo_df <- read_geos_civ_assoc()

for (i in 1:3){
  outputTemplate(i, df_ranks, civ_geo_df)
}
  

```
